allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement browser-based audio pedalboard with real-time DSP effects

Add complete audio playground for bands with pedalboard-style effect chain:

Audio Processing:
- AudioWorklet-based effects: 3-band EQ, Distortion \(soft/hard/tube\), Delay, Chorus, Compressor
- Real-time level metering \(peak + RMS\) at input and output stages
- Input/output gain controls with visual feedback
- Global bypass toggle for instant A/B comparison
- Zero-allocation DSP processing for glitch-free playback

Effect Chain Management:
- Drag-and-drop effect reordering with @dnd-kit
- Per-effect bypass and wet/dry mix controls
- Live parameter adjustment with knob UI

Preset System:
- Save/load presets to localStorage
- Export/import presets as JSON files
- URL sharing with base64-encoded preset data
- 5 built-in presets \(Clean, Crunch, High Gain, Ambient, Vocal\)

Export:
- Offline WAV rendering with OfflineAudioContext
- Deterministic export matching real-time playback
- Support for 16/24/32-bit depth with optional normalization

AI Suggestions:
- Audio analysis \(spectral centroid, frequency bands, dynamics\)
- Intent-based effect recommendations from natural language
- Genre presets for guitar, vocal, bass, ambient

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
